Friday, October 15, 2010

charity:water thanks the Rails community

Posted by David

Thank you, Ruby on Rails community, from Central African Republic.

We raised almost $40,000. Enough for 1,800 people to get clean water. What an amazing achievement. Thanks to everyone who helped get us there, whether your donation was small or large.
